description.translate: A billion screams, confined in a colourless silence, but of a cold and terrifying heat.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Obscurité éblouissante\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Un milliard de hurlements, confinés dans un silence\"}","{\"text\":\"§7sans couleur, mais d'une chaleur froide et terrifiante.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7A billion screams, confined in a colourless silence,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7but of a cold and terrifying heat.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a3 §7HAS§a3 §7HER§a1\"}"],color:695551}}
